verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H3212>Get<s%> you out of your <S%H776>country,<s%> and from your <S%H4138>kindred,<s%> and from your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> that I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you:

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and make your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1431>great;<s%> and you shall be a <S%H1293>blessing:<s%>

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and <S%H779>curse<s%> him that <S%H7043>curses<s%> you: and in you shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with him: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7399>substance<s%> that they had <S%H7408>gathered,<s%> and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that they had <S%H6213>gotten<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran;<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> they <S%H935>came.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7927>Sichem,<s%> to the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh.<s%> And the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> To your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> he an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him.

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> to a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> having <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and <S%H5857>Hai<s%> on the <S%H6924>east:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> on <S%H5265>still<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>grievous<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> he was <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H935>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H4758>look<s%> on:

Therefore it shall come to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> you, that they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is his <S%H802>wife:<s%> and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, but they will <S%H2421>save<s%> you <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

<S%H559>Say,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, you are my <S%H269>sister:<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with me for your <S%H5668>sake;<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H1558>because<s%> of you.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that, when <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> that she was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> also of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, and <S%H1984>commended<s%> her <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And he entreated <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> for her <S%H5668>sake:<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and he <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and she <S%H860>asses,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to me? <S%H4100>why<s%> did you not <S%H5046>tell<s%> me that she was your <S%H802>wife?<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> you, She is my <S%H269>sister?<s%> so I might have <S%H3947>taken<s%> her to me to <S%H802>wife:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore <S%H2009>behold<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and <S%H3212>go<s%> your way.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> him: and they <S%H7971>sent<s%> him away, and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had.
